title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: The very first NFT project was launched on the Ethereum blockchain in 2015, and interest grew in tandem with the rise in interest in cryptocurrency. According to NonFungible.com, sales in the first quarter of 2021 exceeded $2 billion, more than doubling the previous quarter's volume. Celebrities have begun to mint their work on the new Blockchain technology as the market has grown so rapidly. Through this form, artists have discovered a new digital way to monetize their work and broaden their reach.Let's discuss the Future of NFTs today with an NFT Marketing Expert, CMO of Yeti Secret Society, Arvin Khamseh at 3 PM CET on Twitter Spaces.Join us here: https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1YqKDqkDgDNGV
